channel.title: Client, Bit Help needed!
channel.description: hi, i have made a client.. but how i make the client, client sided or someting.. so other people cant edit it ?? can someone tell me because im pretty confused !! Thanks!

item.title: Client, Bit Help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Zelda_Knight Zelda Knight
item.description:
@Zelda_Knight wrote:

LAwl.

To release it?

1.) Learn what client sided/server sided means.
2.) JAR it or simply delete the java files, deleted java files means ppl can still decompile class files though

Kthnxbye

Read full topic
